name: AVO - Expressions Limited Edition - 2024 Toro Extra
additionalNotes: The AVO cigar brand resides in the portfolio of Davidoff. These cigars were created by famous composer and jazz pianist Avo Uvezian, with his passion for jazz, an irresistible charm, and an appetite for new experiences, Uvezian became a composer of fine cigars. As a way of life, he created rare and beautiful moments to be savored and shared by all. To share a moment with AVO is to immerse yourself in a merging of exotic flavors and cultures; in a timeless appreciation for the classics; in spontaneity, guided by inspiration. And within each cigar, you will find a unique experience, a shared moment, a thing worth remembering and passing on to friends both old and new. AVO cigars are produced in a variety of mild to medium-bodied profiles. Rich flavors of wood, spices and dried fruit accompany themes rooted in Avo’s love of music. Handcrafted in the Dominican Republic, AVO cigars achieve their complex characteristics from a variety of Dominican binder and filler leaves, as well as tobaccos from Nicaragua and Peru.
